org.sd.extract
Class AbstractTextNodeExtractor

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.extract.AbstractBaseExtractor
      org.sd.extract.AbstractTextNodeExtractor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Extractor
public abstract class AbstractTextNodeExtractor
extends AbstractBaseExtractor

An abstract extractor that operates on every text node in each docText.

NOTE: extenders of this class are extractors suitable for a PivotContextExtractor.

Author:
Spence Koehler

hasEntity

protected abstract boolean hasEntity(DocText docText,
                                     Tree<XmlLite.Data> textNode,
                                     java.lang.String text)
Determine whether the non-empty text from the textNode in the docText has a valid entity.

Returns:
true if the text has a valid entity; otherwise, false.

shouldExtract

public boolean shouldExtract(DocText docText)
Determine whether the given doc text should be accepted for extraction.

extract

public java.util.List<Extraction> extract(DocText docText,
                                          java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean die)
Perform the extraction on the doc text.

Parameters:
docText - The docText to extract from.
die - Trigger to halt processing. Needs to be monitored and obeyed; but can also be set from within the implementation. Use with care!
Returns:
one or more extractions or null.
